category.name: Suits
category.title: Men's Suits
category.description: PSA: it’s time to suit up with our edit of men’s suits. Whether you’re after an office-ready look or wanna show up and show out, expect a range of designs that have so much versatility you’ll be sorted *whatever* the dress code. With everything from black and navy suits to gray plaid styles to choose from, ASOS DESIGN has something for every vibe. If you’re in the market for wool suit jackets, linen pants or the perf casual set, finding your forever fit’s never been easier thanks to Topman. Prepping for wedding szn? Filter by Noak for the ultimate men’s three-piece summer suits.
